text: Vallées-d'Antraigues-Asperjoc is a commune of the Ardèche department, in the southern part of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Antraigues-sur-Volane (the seat) and Asperjoc.Arrêté préfectoral 29 October 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Vallées-d'Antraigues-Asperjoc
